attributes.action: NHS Funding for Mitchell Huth Now!
attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned want the UK government to fund an urgent life saving treatment for Mitchell Huth (Hornchurch) DOB: 17/06/2005 who suffers from Neuroblastoma Stage 4. This child will die without this treatment which is not available in the UK. The government should therefore pay for him to receive treatment in the USA or Germany.

If the government can spend billions on the Olympics, surely this funding, to save the life of a child, is not much to ask...
